org.apache.commons.math4.ode

Interface ParameterizedODE

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Parameterizable

    public interface ParameterizedODE
extends Parameterizable
    Interface to compute by finite difference Jacobian matrix for some parameter when computing partial derivatives equations.
    Since:
    3.0
